TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInternalConfigWebHost

summary.span: 定义内部 .NET Framework 基础结构用来访问和操作主机配置文件的接口。

span.span: Defines interfaces used by internal .NET Framework infrastructure for accessing and manipulating Host configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetConfigPathFromSiteIDAndVPath (string siteID, string vpath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetConfigPathFromSiteIDAndVPath(string siteID, string vpath) cil managed
Public Function GetConfigPathFromSiteIDAndVPath (siteID As String, vpath As String) As String

param.name: siteID
param.span: 应用程序的站点标识符。
更多信息，请参见 ASP.NET 配置概览。

span.span: For more information, see ASP.NET Configuration Overview.

param.name: vpath
param.span: 应用程序的虚拟路径（字符串形式）。

span.span: The application's virtual path as a string.

param.span: 更多信息，请参见 ASP.NET 网站路径。

span.span: For more information, see ASP.NET Web Site Paths.

summary.span: 返回一个值，它表示与提供的站点标识符关联的配置文件的路径和应用程序的虚拟路径。

span.span: Returns a value representing the path to a configuration file associated with the provided site identifier and application's virtual path.

returns.span: 表示配置文件路径的字符串。

span.span: A string representing the path to a configuration file.

summary.span: 根据应用程序虚拟路径和应用程序配置路径设置配置对象的当前站点标识符。

span.span: Sets the current site identifier of a configuration object based on the application virtual path and the application configuration path.
